name: Redemption Tunic
tooltip:
Redemption TunicLevel 60

Commander Eligor Dawnbringer at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Redemption Tunic if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Tunic, 25 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 4 Arcanite Bars and 3 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Tunic
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 25
- Arcanite Bar x 4
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
